p: The experiment followed a completely randomized design, composed of three extracts (petroleum ether, ethyl acetate, and n-butanol) of A. philoxeroides. Data were tested for normality and homogeneity of variance. ANOVA was conducted on morphology and physiological indices with exudate treatments for A. philoxeroides. Differences between means were assessed with LSD’s and Duncan’s test ( P < 0.05), using the SPSS v.21.0 for Windows. Graphs are performed by Sigmaplot 12.0.
